articles.author: ANI
articles.title: New COVID-19 strain: Mandatory RT-PCR test for those arriving in Mumbai from Europe, China, Middle East - Zee News
articles.description: After the discovery of a new strain of the COVID-19 variant C.1.2, the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has made the RT-PCR test mandatory for international passengers arriving at the Mumbai airport from September 3.
articles.content: MUMBAI: After the discovery of a new strain of the COVID-19 variant C.1.2, the Brihanmumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has made the RT-PCR test mandatory for international passengers arriving at the… [+1383 chars]

articles.title: Amazon adds thousands of UK jobs in global hiring spree - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Online giant will add 55,000 roles and 9,000 jobs in Europe, with the UK winning the biggest slice despite having left the EU
articles.content:
Amazon has around 1.3m workers, making it one of the worlds largest private sector employers. Among the new technology roles will be jobs on its Starlink rival, Project Kuiper.

articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.title: New coronavirus strain designated a variant of interest by WHO - The Irish Times
articles.description: Mu first identified in Colombia in January with cases also recorded in Europe
articles.content:
A new coronavirus strain, named Mu, has been designated a variant of interest by the World Health Organisation (WHO).
